ruleDefinitions.Name: degradationindependencyduration
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: degradationinserverresponsetime
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: digestMailConfiguration
ruleDefinitions.Description: This rule describes the digest mail preferences

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_billingdatavolumedailyspikeextension
ruleDefinitions.DisplayName: Abnormal rise in daily data volume (preview)
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the billing data generated by your application, and can warn you about an unusual increase in your application's billing costs

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_exceptionchangeextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the exceptions thrown in your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in your exception telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_memoryleakextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the memory consumption of each process in your application, and can warn you about potential memory leaks or increased memory consumption.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_securityextensionspackage
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the telemetry generated by your application and detects potential security issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_traceseveritydetector
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the trace logs emitted from your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in the severity of your trace telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Name: longdependencyduration
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: migrationToAlertRulesCompleted
ruleDefinitions.Description: A configuration that controls the migration state of Smart Detection to Smart Alerts

ruleDefinitions.Name: slowpageloadtime
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: slowserverresponsetime
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

properties.description: An environment for deep learning with PyTorch containing the Azure ML SDK and additional python packages.

docker.dockerfile:
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/azureml/openmpi4.1.0-cuda11.1-cudnn8-ubuntu18.04:20211029.v1

ENV AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH /azureml-envs/pytorch-1.10

# Create conda environment
RUN conda create -p $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH \
    python=3.8 \
    pip=20.2.4 \
    pytorch=1.10.0 \
    torchvision=0.11.1 \
    torchaudio=0.10.0 \
    cudatoolkit=11.1.1 \
    nvidia-apex=0.1.0 \
    gxx_linux-64 \
    -c anaconda -c pytorch -c conda-forge

# Prepend path to AzureML conda environment
ENV PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/bin:$PATH

# Install pip dependencies
RUN pip install 'matplotlib>=3.3,<3.4' \
                'psutil>=5.8,<5.9' \
                'tqdm>=4.59,<4.63' \
                'pandas>=1.3,<1.4' \
                'scipy>=1.5,<1.8' \
                'numpy>=1.10,<1.22' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \
                'azureml-core==1.35.0.post1' \
                'azureml-defaults==1.35.0' \
                'azureml-mlflow==1.35.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.35.0' \
                'tensorboard==2.6.0' \
                'tensorflow-gpu==2.6.0' \
                'onnxruntime-gpu>=1.7,<1.10' \
                'horovod==0.23' \
                'future==0.18.2' \
                'torch-tb-profiler==0.3.1'


# This is needed for mpi to locate libpython
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

properties.description: An environment for deep learning with PyTorch containing the Azure ML SDK and additional python packages.

docker.dockerfile:
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/azureml/openmpi4.1.0-cuda11.1-cudnn8-ubuntu18.04:20211111.v1

ENV AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH /azureml-envs/pytorch-1.8

# Create conda environment
RUN conda create -p $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH \
    python=3.7 \
    pip=20.2.4 \
    pytorch=1.8.1 \
    torchvision=0.9.1 \
    cudatoolkit=11.1.1 \
    nvidia-apex=0.1.0 \
    -c anaconda -c pytorch -c conda-forge

# Prepend path to AzureML conda environment
ENV PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/bin:$PATH

# Install pip dependencies
RUN HOROVOD_WITH_PYTORCH=1 \
    pip install 'matplotlib>=3.3,<3.4' \
                'psutil>=5.8,<5.9' \
                'tqdm>=4.59,<4.60' \
                'pandas>=1.1,<1.2' \
                'scipy>=1.5,<1.6' \
                'numpy>=1.10,<1.20' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \
                'azureml-core==1.36.0.post2' \
                'azureml-defaults==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-mlflow==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.36.0' \
                'tensorboard==2.4.0' \
                'tensorflow-gpu==2.4.1' \
                'onnxruntime-gpu>=1.7,<1.8' \
                'horovod[pytorch]==0.21.3' \
                'future==0.17.1'

# This is needed for mpi to locate libpython
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

properties.description: An environment for machine learning with Scikit-learn, LightGBM, XGBoost, Dask containing AzureML Python SDK and additional packages.

docker.dockerfile:
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/azureml/openmpi3.1.2-ubuntu18.04:20211012.v1

ENV AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH /azureml-envs/lightgbm

# Create conda environment
RUN conda create -p $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH \
    python=3.7 pip=20.2.4

# Prepend path to AzureML conda environment
ENV PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/bin:$PATH

# Install pip dependencies
RUN HOROVOD_WITH_TENSORFLOW=1 \
    pip install 'matplotlib>=3.3,<3.4' \
                'psutil>=5.8,<5.9' \
                'tqdm>=4.59,<4.60' \
                'pandas>=1.1,<1.2' \
                'numpy>=1.10,<1.20' \
                'scipy~=1.5.0' \
                'scikit-learn~=0.24.1' \
                'xgboost~=1.4.0' \
                'lightgbm~=3.2.0' \
                'dask~=2021.6.0' \
                'distributed~=2021.6.0' \
                'dask-ml~=1.9.0' \
                'adlfs~=0.7.0' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \
                'azureml-core==1.35.0' \
                'azureml-defaults==1.35.0' \
                'azureml-mlflow==1.35.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.35.0'

# This is needed for mpi to locate libpython
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

    torchaudio=0.7.2 \
    cudatoolkit=11.0 \
    nvidia-apex=0.1.0 \
    -c anaconda -c pytorch -c conda-forge

# Prepend path to AzureML conda environment
ENV PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/bin:$PATH

# Install pip dependencies
RUN HOROVOD_WITH_PYTORCH=1 \
    pip install 'matplotlib>=3.3,<3.4' \
                'psutil>=5.8,<5.9' \
                'tqdm>=4.59,<4.60' \
                'pandas>=1.1,<1.2' \
                'scipy>=1.5,<1.6' \
                'numpy>=1.10,<1.20' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \
                'azureml-core==1.36.0.post1' \
                'azureml-defaults==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-mlflow==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.36.0' \
                'tensorboard==2.4.0' \
                'tensorflow-gpu==2.4.1' \
                'onnxruntime-gpu>=1.7,<1.8' \
                'horovod[pytorch]==0.21.3' \
                'future==0.17.1'

# This is needed for mpi to locate libpython
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

docker.dockerfile:
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/azureml/openmpi4.1.0-cuda11.1-cudnn8-ubuntu18.04:20211029.v1

ENV AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH /azureml-envs/pytorch-1.10

# Create conda environment
RUN conda create -p $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH \
    python=3.8 \
    pip=20.2.4 \
    pytorch=1.10.0 \
    torchvision=0.11.1 \
    torchaudio=0.10.0 \
    cudatoolkit=11.1.1 \
    nvidia-apex=0.1.0 \
    gxx_linux-64 \
    -c anaconda -c pytorch -c conda-forge

# Prepend path to AzureML conda environment
ENV PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/bin:$PATH

# Install pip dependencies
RUN pip install 'matplotlib>=3.3,<3.4' \
                'psutil>=5.8,<5.9' \
                'tqdm>=4.59,<4.63' \
                'pandas>=1.3,<1.4' \
                'scipy>=1.5,<1.8' \
                'numpy>=1.10,<1.22' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \
                'azureml-core==1.36.0.post1' \
                'azureml-defaults==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-mlflow==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.36.0' \
                'tensorboard==2.6.0' \
                'tensorflow-gpu==2.6.0' \
                'onnxruntime-gpu>=1.7,<1.10' \
                'horovod==0.23' \
                'future==0.18.2' \
                'torch-tb-profiler==0.3.1'


# This is needed for mpi to locate libpython
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

                'numpy>=1.10,<1.22' \
                'ipykernel~=6.0' \

FROM mcr.microsoft.com/azureml/openmpi3.1.2-ubuntu18.04
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends apt-utils software-properties-common build-essential libboost-all-dev zlib1g-dev cmake && pip install --upgrade pip
RUN git clone --branch 8.8.0 --recursive https://github.com/VowpalWabbit/vowpal_wabbit.git && cd vowpal_wabbit && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DBUILD_TESTS=OFF -DVW_INSTALL=ON -DBUILD_PYTHON=ON -DPY_VERSION=3.6.2 && make install && cd .. && pip install .

                'azureml-mlflow==1.36.0' \
                'azureml-telemetry==1.36.0' \

ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH $AZUREML_CONDA_ENVIRONMENT_PATH/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
